channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CASSANDRA-8564] Harmless exception logged as ERROR
item.description:
After CASSANDRA-8474, when running the dtest counter_test.py:TestCounters.upgrade_test, we now see the following in the log:

ERROR [CompactionExecutor:2] 2015-01-05 13:59:51,003 CassandraDaemon.java:170 - Exception in thread Thread[CompactionExecutor:2,1,main]
java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException: Task java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask@5e8ea989 rejected from org.apache.cassandra.concurrent.DebuggableScheduledThreadPoolExecutor@7fc92f94[Terminated, pool size = 0, active threads = 0, queued tasks = 0, completed tasks = 5]

According to Benedict, this is harmless. Thus, it should be logged at WARN.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: We already have a ticket or two for RejectedExecutionException during shutdown.
Linking this to CASSANDRA-8996, as it's one of the few remaining causes for failing dtests against trunk
benedict can you look into this soon?
I've wanted to look into this for a while, but realistically my "urgent" queue is growing, not shrinking, so I probably won't for a while yet.

Added rejection execution handler that will silence errors that occur during a shutdown.

https://github.com/tjake/cassandra/tree/8564
It looks like we're still getting a similar error log on the counter test on trunk: http://cassci.datastax.com/job/trunk_dtest/113/testReport/counter_tests/TestCounters/upgrade_test/
